name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Compliments Monkey - Get Random Compliments While You Browse!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Occasionally shows a monkey with a delightful compliment, adding spontaneous moments of positivity to your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Looking for a burst of joy while you browse? Meet Compliments Monkey! This playful Chrome extension is here to sprinkle your day with delightful compliments.

Features:
🐒 Surprise Action-Based Compliments: Enjoy unexpected compliments triggered by your browser actions. You never know when a compliment is coming, adding an element of fun to your day!
🐒 General Compliments: Feeling blue? Get random compliments anytime, just because you deserve it!
🐒 Anti-Spam Protection: No worries about being bombarded with compliments. Our smart protection ensures you get just the right amount.
🐒 Customizable Avatar: Make it personal! Upload your own avatar or choose from three hilarious monkey avatars. Your avatar will deliver each compliment right to you.

Available Languages:
Compliments Monkey speaks multiple languages and automatically adapts to your browser settings. If your language isn't supported yet, English will be your default.

🔹 German (de)
🔹 English (en)
🔹 French (fr)
🔹 Spanish (es)
🔹 Arabic (ar)
🔹 Russian (ru)
🔹 Polish (pl)
🔹 Portuguese (pt)

So, what are you waiting for? Add Compliments Monkey to your Chrome and let the good vibes roll – because you totally deserve it! 🎉

----------------------------
Changelog:

Version 1.1.0:
New Feature: Added a welcome message that appears 30 seconds after the first installation or reinstallation to confirm the extension is running.
Customizable Intervals: Users can now set their own minimum and maximum time intervals for compliments directly in the extension settings.
